data.title: EBSCO Information Services
data.meta_description: EBSCO is the leading provider of research databases, e-journals, magazine subscriptions, ebooks and discovery service for academic libraries, public libraries, corporations, schools, government and medical institutions
data.text:
Reliable information for all kinds of research

Interested in purchasing? Explore products & services for your institution

Looking to start your research? Find your institution to login

Announcing the New CEO of EBSCO Information Services

EBSCO Industries announces Annie Callanan as the new CEO of EBSCO Information Services.

Join the Open Perspectives Forum 2024

Explore the concept of "Open" in libraries globally through our online sessions featuring international perspectives.

LitBase

LitBase is a global literature database with critical primary and secondary sources to support research of the most studied authors, poetry, fiction, plays and creative nonfiction.
